00002 #include "color.h"

00006   Color::Color(Sass_Value* v) : SassValueWrapper(v) {}

00008   Sass_Value* Color::construct(const std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> raw_val, Sass_Value **out) {
00009     double a = 1.0, r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;
00010     unsigned argb;
00011 
00012     switch (raw_val.size()) {
00013     case 1:
00014       if (!raw_val[0]->IsNumber()) {
00015         return fail("Only argument should be an integer.", out);
00016       }
00017 
00018       argb = Nan::To<int32_t>(raw_val[0]).FromJust();
00019       a = (double)((argb >> 030) & 0xff) / 0xff;
00020       r = (double)((argb >> 020) & 0xff);
00021       g = (double)((argb >> 010) & 0xff);
00022       b = (double)(argb & 0xff);
00023       break;
00024 
00025     case 4:
00026       if (!raw_val[3]->IsNumber()) {
00027         return fail("Constructor arguments should be numbers exclusively.", out);
00028       }
00029 
00030       a = Nan::To<double>(raw_val[3]).FromJust();
00031       // fall through vvv
00032 
00033     case 3:
00034       if (!raw_val[0]->IsNumber() || !raw_val[1]->IsNumber() || !raw_val[2]->IsNumber()) {
00035         return fail("Constructor arguments should be numbers exclusively.", out);
00036       }
00037 
00038       r = Nan::To<double>(raw_val[0]).FromJust();
00039       g = Nan::To<double>(raw_val[1]).FromJust();
00040       b = Nan::To<double>(raw_val[2]).FromJust();
00041       break;
00042 
00043     case 0:
00044       break;
00045 
00046     default:
00047       return fail("Constructor should be invoked with either 0, 1, 3 or 4 arguments.", out);
00048     }
00049 
00050     return *out = sass_make_color(r, g, b, a);
00051   }
00052 
00053   void Color::initPrototype(v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> proto) {
00054     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getR", GetR);
00055     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getG", GetG);
00056     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getB", GetB);
00057     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getA", GetA);
00058     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setR", SetR);
00059     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setG", SetG);
00060     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setB", SetB);
00061     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setA", SetA);
00062   }

00080   NAN_METHOD(Color::SetR) {
00081     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00082       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00083     }
00084 
00085     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00086       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a number").ToLocalChecked());
00087     }
00088 
00089     sass_color_set_r(unwrap(info.This())->value, Nan::To<double>(info[0]).FromJust());
00090   }
